results.content: It is an incomplete course, the vast majority of important components are missing: as an example - access to the mobile phone photo camera, video recording, login logout, sending data to the database, taking data from the database, followers and many more. vue.js elementary and some css. After all, there is nothing in this course. Don't buy !!!!!!!!!!!!
